page.title: 16DAY CENTRE, PRINCES RISBOR;
page.content: The Day Centre is for elderly people of the Princes Risborough area who either live on their own or with their children and would not normally get out of their homes. The number of people who help with the running of the Day Centre is about 35, including Ambulance drivers. It has been running now for 6 years in the same place, but they will soon be moving to new premises probably in the next month. The average number of people that come for the 3 days that it opens is about 18 and it is always a different group each time. The Lady who runs the centre has been incharge now for 5 years. The Lunchtime meal that they have is provided by the canteen at the Secondary School. The Day Centre organises outside activities such as day trips to Cathedrals and Theatres.
